abstract: Readers of my latest column have taken issue with my slightly snarky references to Occupy Wall Street. Okay, maybe not "slightly."
snippet: Readers of my latest column have taken issue with my slightly snarky references to Occupy Wall Street. Okay, maybe not "slightly."
lead_paragraph: Aside from our enthusiastic Slovak readership, most of the reader comments and e-mails in response to Monday's column have taken issue with my slightly snarky reference to Occupy Wall Street. Okay, maybe not "slightly." Here's a sample:

headline.main: A Few Words About the Occupiers
